scripts.dev:backend: APP_ENV=local DYNAMODB_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8000 TABLE_NAME=wealth-main AWS_REGION=us-east-1 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=local AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=local node backend/local/server.js

scripts.setup:db:demo: APP_ENV=local DYNAMODB_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8000 TABLE_NAME=wealth-main AWS_REGION=us-east-1 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=local AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=local node backend/scripts/seed-data.js --seed-demo
scripts.import:b3: APP_ENV=local DYNAMODB_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8000 TABLE_NAME=wealth-main AWS_REGION=us-east-1 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=local AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=local node backend/scripts/import-b3.js

scripts.import:robinhood: APP_ENV=local DYNAMODB_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8000 TABLE_NAME=wealth-main AWS_REGION=us-east-1 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=local AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=local node backend/scripts/import-robinhood.js
